description: Built the core front-end project, as well as the chrome extension that consumes data generated from the frontend. Also made contributions to backend Laravel API's.
Built frontend client to consume backend data provided through internal APIs and also contributed to the backend Nodejs API's.
Worked on both the backend and frontend of the internal projects using react, svelte and Node js and Fast API as the backend technologies.
Contributed to the backend infrastructure using (python, Node js, Java) and frontend (react, Vue) projects.
